name: Lucina's Divine Retribution
body:
**Source** Paizo Gamemastery Guide pg. 97
-
Activate (AA) command; Effect Drawing upon Iomedae's divine fury, you single out a target that damaged you or an ally within the past round and fill Lucina with divine vengeance against them. Make a Strike against that foe, dealing an additional damage die on a hit. If the target is evil, it is also enfeebled 1 until the start of your next turn on a hit (or enfeebled 2 on a critical hit).
